Topic.Title: Hollywood Films Movie Theatre Tycoon Game

Posts.EditableText:
Guys, It's Movie Time! Yes, this time we have brought up an all-new theme for the customer service game. You need to provide service to the customers in the cinema house. We have included so many different activities to perform in the movie Theatre. Earn coins & diamonds by performing various activities like giving tickets, specs, newspaper, hand band, food and etc. in every level. We have given three different phases to enjoy them in a single game.Â 

Available on Play-Store : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gameicreate.hollywoodfilmsmovietheatretycoongame

Thank You!
Posts.HTML:
Guys, It's Movie Time! Yes, this time we have brought up an all-new theme for the customer service game. You need to provide service to the customers in the cinema house. We have included so many different activities to perform in the movie Theatre. Earn coins & diamonds by performing various activities like giving tickets, specs, newspaper, hand band, food and etc. in every level. We have given three different phases to enjoy them in a single game. 

Available on Play-Store : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gameicreate.hollywoodfilmsmovietheatretycoongame

Thank You!
